oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Demonstrators holding a letter to American banner
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Matlesky, Greg
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Photographer's description: Photos and videos of protests in Tahrir, Kasr-Al-Nile, and Ministry of the Interior from Jan 28-30, 2011. Text in image: To: America From: The Egyptian People STOP! Supporting Mubarak It's OVER!
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Mubārak, Muḥammad Ḥusnī, 1928-
Demonstrations; Egypt; Foreign relations; Protest movements; Revolutions; United States
Crowds; Protest posters
